team.created: Created new Team with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete the team {{ title }} and its participation in the exercise? This action can NOT be undone!
delete.typeNameToConfirm: Please type in the short name of the team to confirm.

assessment.label: Assessment
assessment.tooltip: Assessment can only be done for successful submissions and after exercise due date.

name.label: Name
name.minlength: The name must be at least 3 characters long.

teamName.missingTeamName: No team name is assigned to the student {{ studentName }} in entry {{ entryNr }}.
teamName.pattern: The team name {{ teamName }} in entry {{ entryNr }} does not start with a letter.

shortName.label: Short Name
shortName.tooltip: The short name of the team can NOT be edited after creating the team! It is used as a unique identifier for the repositories and build plans.
shortName.pattern: The short name must start with a letter and cannot contain special characters.
shortName.minlength: The short name must be at least 3 characters long.
shortName.alreadyTaken: This short name is already taken by another team.

owner.label: Tutor
owner.tooltip: Only instructors can re-assign tutors to teams.

team.invalidFileType: Invalid file type for team import: {{ fileType }}
team.invalidCsvHeader: The CSV file must have the following header: {{ expectedHeader }}
team.invalidCsvLine: Line {{ line }} is not in the proper format
team.missingUserNameOrId: The student in entry {{ entryNr }} has neither a username nor a registration number.
team.addStudentToTeam: Add a student to the team (by searching for login or name)

studentSearch.noResults: No students found in course for search:

errors.studentAlreadyAssignedToTeam: Student with login {{ studentLogin }} is already assigned to team with id {{ teamId }.
errors.registrationNumbersNotFound: Students with following registration numbers could not be found: {{ registrationNumbers }}
errors.loginsNotFound: Students with following usernames could not be found: {{ logins }}
errors.studentsWithoutRegistrationNumbers: Following students do not have registration numbers: {{ students }}
errors.studentsAppearMultipleTimes: Following students appear multiple times in imported teams: {{ students }}
errors.importFailed: Import Teams Failed! Invalid teams file.

team.selectOwnerForTeam: Select tutor (by searching for login or name)

ownerSearch.noResults: No tutors found in course for search:

team.ownerChangeWarning: Important: This will change the tutor for team {{ shortName }} in the whole course!

createTeam.label: Create team
createTeam.error: Could not create team. Please try again.

updateTeam.label: Edit
updateTeam.error: Could not update team. Please try again.

removeTeam.label: Delete
removeTeam.error: Could not remove team. Please try again.

importTeams.introTextExercise: This dialog can be used to import teams from another exercise of this course into this exercise.
importTeams.introTextFile: This dialog can be used to import teams from a .json or .csv file into this exercise.
importTeams.error: Could not import teams. Please try again.

sourceExercise.label: Source exercise
sourceExercise.tooltip: The teams from the selected source exercise will be copied into this exercise.

sourceFile.label: Source file
sourceFile.tooltip: The teams from the selected file will be copied into this exercise.

team.selectExerciseForImport: Select exercise (by searching for the title)

exerciseSearch.noResults: There are no other team-based exercises in this course.
exerciseSearch.noResultsForSearchTerm: No other team-based exercise found in course for search:

sourceTeams.label: Source teams
sourceTeams.tooltip: These teams will be copied into the current exercise.

legend.label: Legend
legend.tooltip: The legend shows the three different conflict states that a source team can have.

conflictFreeTeam.label: Conflict-free team
conflictFreeTeam.tooltip: This team can be imported without any issues.

teamShortNameConflict.label: Team short name conflict
teamShortNameConflict.tooltip: A team with the same short name already exists in this exercise.

studentConflict.label: Student conflict
studentConflict.tooltip: The student highlighted in red is already part of a team for this exercise.

loadSourceTeams.failed: Loading teams failed. Please try again.

team.noTeamsInSourceExercise: The source exercise has no team.

importStrategy.label: Import strategy
importStrategy.tooltip: The import strategy determines which of the source teams will be imported and what happens to existing teams in this exercise.

purgeExisting.label: Purge existing
purgeExisting.explanation: Before importing all of the teams from the source exercise above, all existing teams and their participation in this exercise will be deleted.

createOnly.label: Create only
createOnly.explanation: Only conflict-free source teams (shown above in green) will be imported. Existing teams in this exercise will not be touched.

importPreview.studentsInMultipleTeams: There are students that are in more than one team.

purgeConfirmationDialog.question: Are you sure you want to delete all teams and participation in the exercise {{ title }}? This action can NOT be undone!
purgeConfirmationDialog.typeNameToConfirm: Please type in the title of the exercise to confirm.

team.importError: Import failed. Please try again or contact an administrator for assistance.
team.importSuccess: Import was successful! {{ numberOfImportedTeams }} teams were imported.
